title: WORT KRAFT APP
description: Development of an application for learning and improving German vocabulary. The project involved creating an application with user registration and authentication functionality, the ability to create custom word lists, and step-by-step word learning. Users can track their progress. Key features include written and oral exercises for learning new words. The application includes the following sections: book catalog, book page with a list of topics, topic page with a list of words, learning process page, search page, personal word list page, statistics section and profile page where users can update their data and select the language for learning.
features: Registration and authorization with JWT tokens
Voice playback of words and examples
Popup windows for forms and notifications
Integration with Firebase for graphic storage
